name: Running Latte
description:
Your boss wants coffee, and he wants it now. You're job is on the line. Can you make it to Starducks before the time runs out?

Navigate your office and the streets nearby to make your way to the coffee shop, all the while avoiding a plethora of hazards and obstacles.

A mix between an Infinate Runner and a Beat em Up, Running Latte challenges the player to move as fast as possible, but rewards them for defeating enemies with a super-powerful fire blast that destroys everything in your path!

Compatable with both Xbox controllers and Keyboards.
